title: Egg protein exposure estimation in risk assessment for Japanese food allergy labeling

Author(s): Hiroshi Akiyama, Yoshinari Suzuki, Reiko Adachi, Momoka Kadokura, Asaka Takei, Masayoshi Tomiki, Kosuke Nakamura, Rie Ito, Yusuke Iwasaki, Clare Mills, Yukihiro Ohya, Tatsuki Fukuie
